Docs.summary: Configures the argument to accept only values representing legal file names.
Docs.remarks: A parse error will result, for example, if file path separators are found in the parsed value.

Docs.param: The values that are allowed for the argument.
Docs.summary: Configures the argument to accept only the specified values, and to suggest them as command line completions.
